title: Courtenay C. and Lucy Patten Davis Endowed Chair in Surgical Thoracic Oncology
description: To provide salary, research and /or program support for the Courtenay C, and Lucy Patten Davis Chairholder in Surgical Thoracic Oncology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide salary, research and /or program support for the Courtenay C, and Lucy Patten Davis Chairholder in Surgical Thoracic Oncology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
